channel.title: Shell on 2018 PI4 Computational Bootcamp
channel.description: Recent content in Shell on 2018 PI4 Computational Bootcamp

item.title: The Unix Shell
item.description: The Terminal (Unix Shell) “What is a command shell and why would I use one?” This tutorial is based on the Software Carpentry Unix Shell) lesson. We will refer to it for background information. As you become familiar with the Unix Shell, it will be worth reviewing some of the more advanced topics in the SWC lesson Shell Extras. Today we will learn - how the shell relates to the keyboard, the screen, the operating system, and users’ programs.
